prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon that resembles a small fish with a sleek body and lightning motifs.
I want a cute aquatic Pokemon with a blue body and a red star on its head for my collection.
Generate a Pokemon that has a serpentine shape and can generate electricity, ideal for underwater battles.
Make a small Pokemon that can blend into water environments, featuring accents of yellow and blue.
Imagine a fish-like Pokemon that sparks with electric energy, perfect for a water-themed team.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a tiny aquatic creature into a powerful electric fish.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban waters, with a charming appearance and electric abilities.
